prompts.title: Generate a Viral Blog Post
prompts.prompt: Write a blog post that is likely to go viral on social media. Use a catchy introduction, persuasive tone, and end with a call-to-action. Topic: [your topic].
prompts.description: Create a high-impact blog post designed for viral reach.
prompts.exampleOutput: Intro: 'Did you know most people ignore this one simple tip?' ... [Persuasive main body] ... CTA: 'Share your thoughts below!'

prompts.title: Summarize Any Article
prompts.prompt: Summarize the following article into 5 key bullet points. Highlight the most important facts and actionable takeaways. Article: [paste article here]
prompts.description: Get concise, actionable summaries of any article or paper.
prompts.exampleOutput:
• Main argument: ...
• Key point 2: ...
• Conclusion: ...

prompts.title: Rewrite for Simplicity
prompts.prompt: Rewrite this text to be clear, simple, and suitable for a 12-year-old. Use short sentences and avoid jargon. Text: [paste here]
prompts.description: Make complex info readable for all ages.
prompts.bestFor: Teachers, UX writers, anyone simplifying info.
prompts.exampleOutput: "Photosynthesis is how plants turn sunlight into food. They use water, air, and sunlight to grow."

prompts.title: Create an Engaging Story
prompts.prompt: Write a short story (200-300 words) using this theme: [insert theme]. The story should have a surprising twist at the end.
prompts.description: Get a full story with a plot twist in under 2 minutes.
prompts.exampleOutput: Once upon a time... [plot with twist] ... 'And that’s when they realized, the treasure was inside them all along.'

prompts.title: Professional Email Draft
prompts.prompt: Draft a professional email to [recipient] about [topic]. Keep it polite, concise, and include a clear next step.
prompts.description: Instantly generate polished business emails.
prompts.exampleOutput:
Subject: Meeting Request

Hello [Name],
I hope this message finds you well. I’d like to discuss [topic]. Are you available this week?
Best regards,
[Your Name]

prompts.title: Daily Action Plan
prompts.prompt: Generate a focused daily action plan for someone who wants to achieve [goal]. Include 3 top priorities, 2 quick wins, and 1 thing to avoid.
prompts.description: A structured day plan to get results, not busywork.
prompts.bestFor: Anyone who wants to be intentional and focused.
prompts.exampleOutput: Priorities: 1. Finish project report 2. Gym session 3. Update LinkedIn. Quick wins: Email inbox zero, call client. Avoid: Social media before lunch.

prompts.title: Turn Notes Into To-Do List
prompts.prompt: Convert these meeting/lecture notes into a clear, prioritized to-do list. Notes: [paste your notes here]
prompts.description: Extract tasks from messy notes instantly.
prompts.exampleOutput: To-do: 1. Email Sarah project update 2. Research competitor 3. Schedule design review.

prompts.title: Smart Weekly Review
prompts.prompt: Summarize this week’s progress and generate 3 suggestions for what to improve next week. Highlights: [list your wins and challenges]
prompts.description: Reflect, learn, and grow with every week.
prompts.exampleOutput: This week: Launched new feature, missed workout goals. Next week: 1. Set stricter gym times 2. Ship landing page 3. Delegate bug fixing.

prompts.title: Quick Brainstorm
prompts.prompt: Brainstorm 10 creative solutions for this challenge: [describe your challenge]. Make suggestions diverse and actionable.
prompts.description: Unlock new ideas for any problem, instantly.
prompts.exampleOutput: 1. Partner with micro-influencers 2. Automate onboarding 3. Survey inactive users...

prompts.title: Focus Sprint Coach
prompts.prompt: Act as a focus coach. I want to work deeply for 45 minutes on [task]. Give me a motivating starting message, a mid-sprint reminder, and a closing encouragement.
prompts.description: Turn AI into your Pomodoro/focus buddy.
prompts.bestFor: Anyone who wants to work in deep, distraction-free sprints.
prompts.exampleOutput: Start: 'Let’s crush this! For 45 minutes, nothing but your task.' Mid: 'You’re halfway—don’t stop now.' End: 'Sprint complete—celebrate and take a break!'

prompts.title: Create a Winning Ad Copy
prompts.prompt: Write a short, persuasive ad copy for [product/service]. Highlight one key benefit and include a call-to-action.
prompts.description: Ad copy that gets clicks and conversions.
prompts.exampleOutput: Discover restful sleep with SleepX Pillow. Wake up energized—order yours today!

prompts.title: SEO-Optimized Product Description
prompts.prompt: Write an SEO-friendly product description for [product]. Use relevant keywords, make it compelling, and keep it under 100 words.
prompts.description: Get found online with AI-powered descriptions.
prompts.exampleOutput: Our wireless earbuds deliver crystal-clear sound and 24-hour battery life. Perfect for music, work, and travel—buy now for free shipping!

prompts.title: Engage with Social Media Comments
prompts.prompt: Reply to this social media comment in a positive, brand-appropriate way: [insert comment here]
prompts.description: Respond like a pro and boost engagement.
prompts.exampleOutput: Thanks for your feedback! We’re glad you love our app. Stay tuned for more updates!

prompts.title: Newsletter Subject Line Generator
prompts.prompt: Suggest 5 attention-grabbing subject lines for an email newsletter about [topic]. Make them clear, catchy, and 50 characters or less.
prompts.description: Boost open rates with AI subject lines.
prompts.exampleOutput:
1. Unlock This Week’s Best Deals
2. 3 Secrets to Smarter Workflows
3. Don’t Miss Our New Release...

prompts.title: Quick Brand Voice Guide
prompts.prompt: Summarize our brand voice in 3 bullet points. Brand: [describe your brand, audience, values]
prompts.description: Clarify and document your brand’s tone fast.
prompts.exampleOutput:
• Friendly, never pushy
• Clear and practical
• Always encouraging action

prompts.title: Instant Meeting Notes
prompts.prompt: Summarize the following meeting transcript into clear, actionable notes. Highlight decisions made, next steps, and assigned owners. Transcript: [paste here]
prompts.description: Turn messy transcripts into clean, useful notes.
prompts.exampleOutput:
- Decision: Launch feature next Friday
- Next step: QA test (assigned to Sam)
- Follow up with marketing

prompts.title: Professional SWOT Analysis
prompts.prompt: Write a brief SWOT analysis for [business, project, or product]. List 2 points each for Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, and Threats.
prompts.description: Strategic insight in 1 minute.
prompts.exampleOutput:
Strengths: Loyal users, high retention
Weaknesses: Limited brand awareness
Opportunities: Expand into Europe
Threats: New competitor

prompts.title: Pitch Deck Slide Generator
prompts.prompt: Generate concise bullet points for a pitch deck slide on [topic]. Focus on clarity and impact. Limit to 5 bullets.
prompts.description: Fill pitch decks in seconds, not hours.
prompts.exampleOutput:
• Market need: 80% lack easy tracking
• Solution: One-click reporting
• Business model: Monthly SaaS

prompts.title: Write a Follow-Up Email
prompts.prompt: Draft a polite follow-up email to [person/company] about [topic]. Mention last contact and suggest a clear next step.
prompts.description: Never forget to close the loop on deals.
prompts.exampleOutput: Hi Sarah, just checking in after our last call about the proposal. Would you like to schedule a quick follow-up this week?

prompts.title: Quick Decision Matrix
prompts.prompt: Help me make a decision about [choice]. Create a simple pro/con list and give a 1-sentence recommendation.
prompts.description: AI weighs the options—fast.
prompts.exampleOutput: Option: Hire new designer. Pros: Fresh ideas, more bandwidth. Cons: Onboarding time, higher cost. Recommendation: Hire if budget allows.

prompts.title: Explain Code in Plain English
prompts.prompt: Explain the following code in simple, step-by-step language for a beginner. Code: [paste code here]
prompts.description: Demystify any codebase—no jargon.
prompts.exampleOutput: "This function takes a list, checks each number, and prints it if it’s even."

prompts.title: Debug This Code
prompts.prompt: Find and fix any bugs or errors in this code. Suggest improvements. Code: [paste code here]
prompts.description: Get actionable bug fixes, instantly.
prompts.exampleOutput: Bug: Missing semicolon on line 4. Improvement: Use a forEach loop for clarity.

prompts.title: SQL Query Generator
prompts.prompt: Write an SQL query for this goal: [describe data you want]. Explain what the query does.
prompts.description: Write, use, and learn SQL fast.
prompts.bestFor: Data analysts, app devs, business pros.
prompts.exampleOutput:
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2024-01-01';
This gets all users who joined after Jan 1, 2024.

prompts.title: Regex Builder
prompts.prompt: Write a regular expression that matches: [describe pattern]. Explain it in plain English.
prompts.description: Never guess at regex again.
prompts.exampleOutput:
Regex: ^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.com$
Explained: Matches emails ending with .com

prompts.title: Code Review for Best Practices
prompts.prompt: Review this code for best practices and style. Give 3 quick suggestions. Code: [paste code here]
prompts.description: Quick, actionable code reviews.
prompts.bestFor: Anyone who wants cleaner, safer code.
prompts.exampleOutput:
1. Use camelCase for variables
2. Add comments for functions
3. Avoid deep nesting

prompts.title: Personalized Joke Generator
prompts.prompt: Tell me a funny joke about [topic, person, or hobby]. Keep it light and original.
prompts.description: Instant laughs on any topic.
prompts.exampleOutput: "Why did the developer stay at their desk? To catch the next bug!"

prompts.title: Plan My Weekend
prompts.prompt: Create a fun weekend plan for someone who enjoys [interests/hobbies] and lives in [city]. Include one outdoor and one indoor activity.
prompts.description: Make every weekend memorable.
prompts.exampleOutput: Saturday: Visit the botanical gardens (outdoor). Sunday: Try a new board game café (indoor).

prompts.title: Recipe From What’s In My Fridge
prompts.prompt: Suggest a tasty recipe I can make using only these ingredients: [list ingredients]. Keep it simple and healthy.
prompts.description: Never waste food—get creative meals.
prompts.exampleOutput: Omelet with spinach, tomatoes, and feta. Optional: add a side salad.

prompts.title: Quick Mood Booster
prompts.prompt: Share 3 fast tips or affirmations to boost my mood after a rough day. Make them positive and practical.
prompts.description: Feel better—instantly.
prompts.exampleOutput:
1. Take 5 deep breaths
2. Text a friend something nice
3. Remember one thing you did well today

prompts.title: Fun Trivia Time
prompts.prompt: Give me 3 fun trivia questions (and answers) about [topic]. Make them interesting but not too hard.
prompts.description: Play trivia with friends or solo.
prompts.exampleOutput:
Q: What planet is known as the Red Planet? A: Mars
Q: Who wrote 'Harry Potter'? A: J.K. Rowling

prompts.title: Explain Like I’m 5
prompts.prompt: Explain [topic or concept] in the simplest way possible, as if teaching a 5-year-old.
prompts.description: Make any concept easy for anyone.
prompts.exampleOutput: "Electricity is like water flowing through pipes—it moves and gives things energy."

prompts.title: Flashcard Generator
prompts.prompt: Generate 10 flashcards (Q&A) for studying [subject or topic].
prompts.description: Turn any subject into bite-size study cards.
prompts.exampleOutput:
Q: Capital of France? A: Paris
Q: H2O is the formula for? A: Water

prompts.title: Quiz Me
prompts.prompt: Ask me 5 quiz questions about [topic], from easy to challenging, and tell me the answers after I try.
prompts.description: Practice and test knowledge, fast.
prompts.exampleOutput: Q1: What is photosynthesis? A: ... Q5: What’s the powerhouse of the cell? A: Mitochondria

prompts.title: Summarize for Study
prompts.prompt: Summarize this textbook chapter or article into 5 concise bullet points, focusing on what to remember for a test.
prompts.description: High-yield summaries for exam prep.
prompts.exampleOutput:
• Main concept: Supply and demand
• Key term: Elasticity
• Example: Apple price drop increases sales

prompts.title: Language Practice Partner
prompts.prompt: Act as my [language] conversation partner. Ask me simple questions, correct my mistakes, and explain grammar points.
prompts.description: Practice any language—no tutor needed.
prompts.exampleOutput: Bot: How are you today? User: I good. Bot: You should say, 'I am good.'

prompts.title: Polish My Resume Bullet
prompts.prompt: Rewrite this resume bullet point to be more impactful, using action verbs and quantifying results. Original: [paste bullet]
prompts.description: Make your CV stand out with stronger phrasing.
prompts.exampleOutput: Led a team of 5 to launch 3 new features, increasing user retention by 20%.

prompts.title: Answer Common Interview Questions
prompts.prompt: Help me answer this interview question in a strong, concise way: [paste question]
prompts.description: Prepare for any interview, fast.
prompts.exampleOutput: Q: Tell me about yourself. A: I’m a results-driven analyst with a passion for solving problems...

prompts.title: LinkedIn Headline Generator
prompts.prompt: Suggest 3 catchy LinkedIn headlines for a [role/field] who specializes in [skills].
prompts.description: Upgrade your profile’s first impression.
prompts.exampleOutput:
• Data Analyst | Turning Numbers Into Insights
• Product Manager | Building What Matters
• Software Engineer | Code with Impact

prompts.title: Negotiate Salary Email
prompts.prompt: Draft a polite, professional email to negotiate salary for a new job offer. Include gratitude and specific ask.
prompts.description: Negotiate with confidence.
prompts.exampleOutput: Thank you for the offer. Based on my skills, I’d like to discuss a salary closer to $X. Looking forward to your response.

prompts.title: Find Transferable Skills
prompts.prompt: List 5 transferable skills someone in [your current job/field] can use to switch to [target job/field].
prompts.description: See the value in your experience—instantly.
prompts.exampleOutput: From sales to project management: Communication, organization, negotiation, reporting, leadership.
